acceptedAnswer.text: Arbitrum is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum developed by Offchain Labs. It aims to solve Ethereum's scalability issues by offloading most computational work from the main chain, resulting in increased throughput and reduced transaction costs.

Arbitrum uses Optimistic Rollups, a method that assumes transaction validity by default, unlike zk-Rollups that require cryptographic proofs. This technology processes transactions off-chain into batches, reducing data recorded on Ethereum, lowering costs, and speeding up transactions.
